reviews.sentence: Good. We did not get cream for the coffee in the room nor did we get two cafenateted bags. We had to get dressed and run downstairs for coffee Called front desk and nobody answered We ate breakfast in restaurant and had to go find someone in kitchen so we could pay and leave. Pillows were terrible and bed was hard Need toleRn from Hiliday inn.

Better hope no one is staying next door. We stayed on the top floor for a Saturday night. Most things about our stay were positive. We had some issues with the light fan combination in the bathroom. the light flickered and the fan was quite loud. The bed was comfortable but squeaky. Those were minor issues. The room was comfortable and we had good service. However at about 1 or 2 am the people staying in the next room came in. They were pretty clearly speaking in a normal tone of voice not being particularly load or anything. They also turned on the TV to what again would seem to be a normal volume. The problem was that all of this noise sounded to us like it was happening almost in our room or like there was a hole in the wall or something. I suspect it maybe the quality of the ceiling or something. We could hear exactly what they were saying and what was going on with the TV. They went to sleep and then got up at around 7 am when once again we could hear exactly what was going on not just talkingI have stayed in a lot of hotel rooms and yes some of them had thin walls. This was a completely different level though. No one should have to feel like they have other people in the room with them when they have paid for a hotel room. I asked the hotel both in person and via e mail for an explanation and received none. did not even really get an apology. We will not be staying at Radisons again.

convenient to interstate. I would be a little hesitant to recommend this hotel because of the lack of amenities in the room. There was no safe no frig no microwave. It was convenient for me this time because I drove in from the Milwaukee airport. The worst thing I will say is that even though my phone and IPad said wifi was connected we never got service in the entire hotel. We had to go outside for service. Even one of the employees said the service was very poor. That certainly needs to be addressed business can not be conducted outside. The personel were nice and helpful. Wifi servicead a microwave and frig to rooms.

Nice close to shopping and highway. A girls get away. Shopping eating and relaxing. The accommodations staff and overall appearance of the hotel met my expectations. The room size was ok for 2. shared a double room. Our friends had a suitelimited number nice size. Included a fridge and microwave. Rooms are clean and comfortable. Modern décor. Onsite restaurant it was nice to grab an appetizer before shopping. Shopping highway easy access. Not very many restaurants. Ate at Cracker Barrel as Texas Roadhouse had an hour wait. Need microwave and fridges in all guest rooms.

It was interesting to say the least. Everything was ok. act of nature a storm knocked out power for over 3 hrs and we could not check in until power was back on it was 8 pm when we get a room. They assigned our room to 2 people. I felt bad f9r the desk clerk she did the best she could. They did give us 20 off the only reason we stayed there was so the kids could go swimming. I think a better discount would have been a voucher for a free night.

Good. Location closest lodging to recreation complex we visited. Timing scheduling of housekeeping. Our room was not cleaned until 230 PMThis survey site is not capturing the scores I have selected. that is why the score shows 0.

Will be great again after remodeling is complete. Great hotel. Awesome staff. Just is in the process of pool being remodeled as well as rooms on floors. Carpets worn and stained in the old rooms. Elevator had construction dust. But staff on a holiday weekend were great and the hotel is putting money into the remodel so I will stay there again.

Convenient but needs as is getting a facelift. Looks like they are in the midst of remodeling which is needed. Carpets in hallways bathroom tile counter tub etc. are good examples of where the age and wear is quite obvious. Nice property in a good location and once the updates are done it will be top notch but right now it is a bit rough. Still would recommend but with that caveat.

Not that spectacular. I reserved a room with 2 queen sized beds and received not only just one bed but a queen sized. There was no continental breakfast and given the cost of the rom I feel there should have been. The room had only a shower and not a bathtub. I have never had a room without a tub in the bathroom. Just overall unimpressed for a Radison hotel. I will be completing more business in this area going forward and will not be staying here again.

Hotel was clean and nice however the walls are paper thin and I heard everyone in the hallway and rooms around me. Very annoying trying to get a good night sleep. I was also placed just across from the elevator and it seemed as though people would congregate at the elevator and talk so I could hear everything.
1010. friendly staff. nice and clean room. pool are relaxing. great food at chancery.
Excellent stay. Very well located brand new hotel. The room is very generous in space. Overall very good hotel and not expensive. Would definitely come back.
We stay here frequently as a family. The rooms are always clean and modern. We enjoy the pool hot tub. Always happy with our stay.

I was at the hotel for a memorial service and was very pleased. Greeted by Janele at check in with a friendly smile and free breakfast and drink tickets. The room was very nice and clean. I would recommend this hotel. Hotel staff very helpful.
very friendly staff when we arrived. Janele was a sweatheart nice touch with cookies and bottled water when we checked in.

The hotel was nice and the staff was very friendly. My only complaint is that our room reeked of cigarette smoke. Clearly someone had smoked by the AC unit and they never changed the filter so the room smelled like dirty ashtray. We also noticed that every time we went downstairs the staff was laying around on the couches and hanging out in the lobby. They were friendly enough but it is odd to see all of the cleaning maintenance staff sitting around on the guest couches in the middle of the day. Ample parking good location. Besides the smell our room was clean and new.

We went to the renaissance faire. We will stay here again in the future. Very nice hotel with friendly staff. They had a shuttle to and from the faire. Nice restaurant on site and very comfortable room.

Modern hotel and trendy rooms worth staying a night. Modern hotel and rooms. Front desk is on point with excellent customer service which is hard to come across nowadays. It had all the amenities like a pool and 24 hour gym. Delicious restaurant connected to the hotel. Across the street from the hotel there is an Outlet mall which is one of the best outlet mall in Wisconsin and illinois When I booked my hotel room on bokingcom it stated the room had breakfast included. When I checked into the hotel front desk said there was no breakfast included. I checked into my room and diged up my email confirmation for the hotel. The email also stated breakfast included. Showed it to front desk Gail. and she was quick to fix it. Gave me a breakfast coupon. Great customer service on hotel end.

We stayed at your hotel Friday night. We were greeted with a friendly desk clerk and chocolate chip cookies. Yum. Room was comfortable and clean. Had appetizers and drinks in Chancery Restaurant and breakfast in the morning. Everything was great. We have been staying at the Double tree in pleasant prairie For the past 15 years for our annual shopping trip and it never disappoints. The only thing we miss is the coupon books they use to give out for the outlet mall across the street.
